means: （彻底）消灭( annihilate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The Dutch annihilated the Olympic champions 5-0.
sentence.Network_cn: 荷兰队以5比0完胜奥运冠军队。

sentence.Network_en: Our soldiers annihilated a force of three hundred enemy troops.
sentence.Network_cn: 我军战士消灭了300名敌军.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 常用佛教名词英语翻译 - 其他宗派 -... ... an amala fruit 庵摩罗果 * annihilated 断灭 * analogy 譬喻 *.
annihilate 漂移, annihilated 零化, annihilate 零化
The home basketball team annihilated the visiting team ., 地主篮球队大败客队.
In the Majiang Battle between China and France, Chinese Fujian Sea Fleet was almost annihilated.在中法马江之战中 ,中国的福建舰队几乎全军覆没。

list.abs: 物理专业英语词汇(P)|数学物理英语词汇 ... positron 正电子 positron annihilation 正电子湮没 positron beam 正电子束.
...收藏查看湮没辐射湮没辐射(annihilation radiation)当一种粒子与其反粒子相互作用并且终止各自的存在而产生的电离辐射β +粒子的平均寿命只有10^ -9 S它.
annihilation operator 湮没算符annihilation photon 湮没光子Annihilation Radiation 湮没辐射
foam analysis 泡沫分析foam annihilator 泡沫灭火器foam application rate 泡沫应用率

entry.tran: 歼灭；消灭；毁灭；彻底击溃
entry.def: To annihilate something means to destroy it completely.

example.ex: There are lots of ways of annihilating the planet...

entry.tran: （在竞赛或争论中）彻底击败，大胜
entry.def: If you annihilate someone in a contest or argument, you totally defeat them.

example.ex: The Dutch annihilated the Olympic champions 5-0.
example.tran: 荷兰队以5比0完胜奥运冠军队。

example.en: Pete went out and got annihilated.
example.zh: 皮特出去喝了个烂醉如泥。

auth_sentence.content: She and the nine accompanying destroyers annihilated the rest of the German flotilla.
auth_sentence.res_content: She and the nine accompanying destroyers annihilated the rest of the German flotilla.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She and the nine accompanying destroyers annihilated the rest of the German flotilla.

auth_sentence.content: Yet somehow, as the cosmos cooled, matter was not completely annihilated.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet somehow, as the cosmos cooled, matter was not completely annihilated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet somehow, as the cosmos cooled, matter was not completely annihilated.

auth_sentence.content: Durga annihilated the demon Mahishasura after a relentless battle lasting nine days and nights.
auth_sentence.res_content: Durga annihilated the demon Mahishasura after a relentless battle lasting nine days and nights.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Durga annihilated the demon Mahishasura after a relentless battle lasting nine days and nights.
